none: 78 x 56 cm, on sheet 100 x 78 cm

Scale 1:500,000 ; projection conforme de Gauss. Ellipsoïde de Clarke 1880 (E 28°30ʹ--E 31°/S 1°--S 4°30ʹ). ; Relief shown by contours.; Contour interval: 100 meters.; "Décembre 1951."; In lower right margin: "P-4-52."; Map shows roads, railways, and portions of Uganda, Congo Belge, and Tanganyika Territory.
